name: Pixel Boy Learns Self Defense
description: This  is a game about a small pixelated man  learning to defend himself in a dangerous  world full of sword throwing zombies. You must find your way to the exit in each of the levels in order to get to the large gate at the end of the game. Defense is your only offense against the sword zombies. Challenging platforming awaits on the harder levels. Press WASD to move, Space to jump (press twice to double jump), click to block and reflect the swords back at the zombies to kill them.
